content.description: 6 feet right of Acerbic Terrace, start on edges below the tree growing out from the ledge. Campus a couple moves to the jugs at the ledge and then work some mantle hand-foot match magic to sneak up to the top!
content.location: 6 feet right of Acerbic Terrace, look for a tree growing out of the ledge.

content.description: Sit start on pockets/seam around the arete from Wow. Work up to the left along the seam then start bumping right along jugs and edges to top out at Crazy Mazie.
content.location: In between Crazy Mazie and Wow.

content.description: Start on the arete on the small boulder to the right of Chimera.  Right hand on a small incut edge and left around the arete on a sloper dish.  Find feet and work your way up!  Cool holds and powerful moves.
content.location: Overhung arete to the right of the chimney.

content.description: Sit start on a sloped rail on the left-hand arete of the main face of the boulder. Crack and flake around the left side of the arete are off. Work arete and side pulls to the top. Top out is tricky and the ledge to the left is off so check out the top first.
content.location: Left arete of the main face. Sit start on a sloping rail.

content.description: Start as for Acerbic Terrace but instead of following the jugs right, mantle up onto the shelf and then layback off of a right-hand edge. Work up the layback to jugs at the top.
content.location: Sit starts on the start of Acerbic Terrace, but mantles up onto the shelf and tops out straight up.

content.description: Bizarre kneeling start on horrible pockets...two-finger right hand and three-finger left hand. Do a pull up to get feet off ground and campus to a bomber right-hand jug. Match on the jug and then go for a side pull with your right hand up around the roof, shoot your left up to another jug and top out.
content.location: Around the corner from the main face of the invisible boulder on the roof of a smaller boulder to the right. The start is on two small pockets on the center-right of the overhung roof.

content.description: Start around the corner on the right side of the vertical wall just before the small cave. Use diagonal cracks and pockets to work up and left and top out.
content.location: The right side of the vertical face just left of the small cave. Around the corner to the right of the main face of the boulder.

content.description: Start on the Crazy Mazie starting hold then bump left up to a sloper crimp. After that, bump right to a sloper on the opposite boulder that forms the chimney. Work up the chimney and top out on the smaller overhung boulder.
content.location: To the right of Crazy Mazie.

content.description: Sit start left-center of the main face on a noticeable crack. Work up and right on the ledge and then back left on the next ledge to jugs. Then, top out.
content.location: Sit starts left-center of the main face.

content.description: Beautiful featured rock. Pockets, cracks, and cool quartz nodules.
